metadata.title: CVE-2012-0880 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache Xerces-C++ allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted message sent to an XML service that causes hash table collisions.

notes.note: mikesalvatore> No fix could be found as of 2018-10-24.

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-01-01').
